title: milankozlevcar
author: milankozlevcar
content: Introducing WaweSwaps: The Global Platform Revolutionizing Token LiquidityGreetings, BitcoinTalk community!We are excited to introduce WaweSwaps, a revolutionary global platform dedicated to streamlining and enhancing token liquidity like never before.WaweSwaps utilizes advanced algorithms and cutting-edge technology to provide users with a seamless and efficient swapping experience. Our mission is to contribute to a cleaner and more efficient cryptocurrency ecosystem by boosting liquidity for liquid, less liquid, and even illiquid tokens.What sets WaweSwaps apart is its unique approach to liquidity management. Our algorithm dynamically calculates the optimal amount of GBL tokens required to empower your swaps, ensuring maximum liquidity utilization. With WaweSwaps, you can enjoy swift and secure token swaps with enhanced liquidity provision.The platform will be launched on June 26th, 2023Key Features of WaweSwaps:Efficient Liquidity Utilization: Our algorithm intelligently determines the optimal amount of GBL tokens to be used for each swap, maximizing the liquidity of the Global Token (GBL).Global Token (GBL): GBL is designed for global circulation and usage on the Binance Smart Chain network. It has a fixed supply without the possibility of additional minting or burning. The distribution of GBL tokens is determined through WaweSwaps mechanisms, which incorporate the well-known "halving" protocol. A maximum of 17.9 million GBL tokens will be in circulation and held by the public, influencing the calculation of the GBL token's Market Cap.Enhanced Swapping Experience: WaweSwaps provides a seamless and hassle-free token swapping experience, allowing you to focus on your investment strategies.Transparent and Secure: We prioritize the security and privacy of our users. WaweSwaps implements robust security measures and ensures complete transparency throughout the swapping process. The model is self-regulated, providing added peace of mind.Global Accessibility:WaweSwaps is a global platform accessible to users from all corners of the world. Join our community and experience the power of decentralized swapping.Community-driven: By using WaweSwaps, you become part of GBL DAO, releasing undistributed GBL tokens into circulation and becoming a member of the DAO. The VGBL tokens held in the DAO pool provide decision-making power and management capabilities.We invite you to be a part of the WaweSwaps revolution! Join us as we redefine the future of token swaps and experience enhanced liquidity, efficiency, and security like never before.Liquidity Providing Token sale announcement!FROM today, 15.06.2023, 12:00 (GST) TO 25.06.2023, 12:00 (GST) PARTICIPANTS WILL HAVE THE CHANCE TO ACQUIRE GBL TOKENS BY SENDING THEIR DESIRED AMOUNT OF USDT.THIS TOKEN SALE IS DESIGNED TO OFFER OUR COMMUNITY A FAIR AND ACCESSIBLE OPPORTUNITY TO BECOME PART OF THE WAWESWAPS ECOSYSTEM.(details are available on: https://waweswaps.global)To learn more about WaweSwaps and join our community, please visit our official website at https://waweswaps.global.You are also welcome to read the WaweSwaps Whitepaper: https://docs.waweswaps.com/Whitepaper_WS.pdfStay tuned for further updates, announcements, and exciting developments by visiting: https://docs.waweswaps.comFollow us on social media: https://twitter.com/waweswaps.For any inquiries or support, feel free to reach out to us at gbl@waweswaps.com. Our dedicated team is ready to assist you.Let's ride the waves of token swapping with WaweSwaps!_________________Best regards,Milan KozlevcarWaweSwaps Team

comments.author: milankozlevcar
comments.body: Liquidity Providing Token Sale is FINISHED!We are pleased to announce that the Liquidity Providing Token Sale has successfully concluded. All collected USDT funds have been injected into the liquidity pool on PancakeSwap, ensuring transparency and liquidity for all participants.You can view the liquidity pool details on CoinMarketCap DEXScan:https://coinmarketcap.com/dexscan/bsc/0x9371968eabcda6901362f172ac7c4c51dffd28e5Participants of the Liquidity Providing Token Sale have received an equivalent amount of GBL Tokens based on their contribution. The exchange rate between USDT and GBL is set at 1.00 USDT / 1.00 GBL.We are pleased to announce that the total accumulated GBL liquidity provided in exchange for USDT amounts to 11,593.62 USDT.Thank you for your participation, and we wish you a happy swapping experience!

comments.author: milankozlevcar
comments.body: Quote from: milankozlevcar on June 26, 2023, 06:20:03 AMüì¢ Important Announcement: WaweSwaps Smart Contract Integration with Geton GlobalWe are thrilled to announce the successful integration of WaweSwaps smart contract with Geton Global, making it the pioneering platform to utilize our unique swapping pool.This integration brings forth a seamless interoperability between WaweSwaps.Global and Geton.Global. All swaps initiated on either platform will now be interconnected, with the only distinction being the specific tokens involved in the swapping process.By taking this significant step, WaweSwaps is prepared to extend integration to other eligible swapping platforms. The specific details and final decisions regarding these integrations will be subject to GBL DAO voting.For further information and comprehensive details, please visit the following sources:üåê https://geton.globalüåê https://docs.waweswaps.com/integrations.htmlüåê https://docs.waweswaps.com/globalrates.htmlWe are excited about this integration and the enhanced opportunities it brings to the Geton Ecosystem's community. Stay tuned for more updates as we continue to advance the capabilities of WaweSwaps.Best regards,WaweSwaps Team

comments.author: milankozlevcar
comments.body: Important Announcement: Stability Initiative - Second Liquidity Providing Token Saleüì¢ Attention WaweSwaps Community! üì¢Exciting News! We are thrilled to announce the GBL Second Token Sale event!üìÜ Sale Dates: From 31.07.2023, 12:00 (GST) to 02.08.2023, 12:00 (GST)üöÄ This is your chance to get your hands on GBL tokens per 4.00 USDT by simply sending your desired amount of USDT.Token Sale Wallet:Send the desired amount of USDT to the following token sale address before the end of the token sale (02.08.2023, 12:00 GST):0xCD05BBD3b097e8bD062BB8E7d103aeeDbb48ba16Our aim with this token sale is to provide our amazing community with a fair and accessible opportunity to join the WaweSwaps ecosystem.Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to become a part of our growing community and contribute to the WaweSwaps success story!üåê https://waweswaps.globalüåê https://docs.waweswaps.com/tokensale.htmlüåê https://docs.waweswaps.com/rates.htmlüåê https://bscscan.com/token/0xc14a7747cfec02cfea62e72bb93538de6b2078e6üåê https://coinmarketcap.com/dexscan/bsc/0x9371968eabcda6901362f172ac7c4c51dffd28e5Stay tuned for further details and happy swapping! üåäüîÑBest regards,WaweSwaps Team
